labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.system_settings: Dell Latitude E5540 - Windows 10 Professional x64, Fall Creators Update. (Screen resolution was 1920 x 1080)
data.actual_result: Discord Overlay is MIA (missing in action) / not present.
data.expected_result: Discord Overlay should show with CTRL + ALT (depending on your overlay settings)
data.short_description: Discord Overlay does not appears when having a 1920 x 1080 screen resolution (Can also check other resolutions)
data.steps_to_repro: - Open a game like Surgery Simulation 2013 or League of Legends (there may be others, do play around with that.) - Attempt to toogle overlay.
